page.title: 02FARMING
page.content: IN{LUTHRIE}AND{MOONZIE}AREA THERE ARE ABOUT 10 FARMS.ON EACH FARM THERE ARE DIFFERENT TYPES OF{TRACTORS}AND {FORKLIFTS.}THERE IS A FARM SELLING {TRACTORS}IN THE{NORTH EAST}OF OUR AREA.THE AVERAGE ACREAGE OF THE FARMS IS{240 ACRES.}THE AVERAGE AMOUNT OF LAND USED FOR ARABLE IS{125 ACRES.}THE AVERAGE AMOUNT OF GRASSLAND IS{200 {ACRES.}THE AVERAGE AMOUNT OF STOCK ON EACH FARM IS{240.}SOME OF THE FARMS ARE OWNED BY THE FARMERS AND OTHERS ARE TENANTED.THE MAIN BREEDS OF STOCK USED ARE{HEREFORDS,BLACK FACED EWES, {FREISIANS,ABERDEEN ANGUSES,CROSS {HEREFORDS}AND{CHAROLAIS.}THE MAIN TYPES OF CROPS GROWN ARE{WINTER {BARLEY,SPRING BARLEY,WHEAT, OATS, {TURNIPS,POTATOES,OIL SEED RAPE AND {GRASS.}MOST OF THE LAND IN THIS AREA IS HILLY,SO IT IS MOSTLY ALL {GRASSLAND.
